Class DatasetSplitting

      • split

        public static void split(xURI datasetUri,
                         xURI store,
                         double testRatio,
                         ProgressListener registeredListener)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Splitting dataset into training dataset and testing dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetUri - URI of original dataset.
        store - storage (directory) for split training dataset and testing dataset.
        testRatio - ratio of splitting.
        registeredListener - listener to monitor splitting progress.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.

                         double testRatio,
                         ProgressListener registeredListener)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Splitting dataset into training dataset and testing dataset.
        Parameters:
        datasetUri - URI of original dataset.
        testRatio - ratio of splitting.

      • makeSparse

        public static void makeSparse(DataConfig srcConfig,
                              java.lang.String srcUnit,
                              int[] sparseIndices,
                              double sparseRatio,
                              ProgressListener registeredListener)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Making sparse the unit (table) specified by the source configuration and source unit. The resulted sparse unit is stored in the storage of source unit.
        Parameters:
        srcConfig - specified source configuration.
        srcUnit - specified source unit.
        sparseIndices - index list of columns to be made sparse
        sparseRatio - ratio of making sparse.
        registeredListener - listener to monitor making sparse progress.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if any error raises.
